issue.title: [Plasma] Speed up Plasma tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1259](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1259). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At the moment Plasma Linux entry in the build matrix seems to hit the Travis limits sometimes. One way to speed the build significantly is by making the subscribe a little less demanding; this gets the time taken down from 40-45min to 25min.
